org.displaytag.util

Interface RequestHelperFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRequestHelperFactory, PortletRequestHelperFactory

    public interface RequestHelperFactory
    RequestHelperFactory interface.

    Users can specify a custom RequestHelperFactory implementation in displaytag.properties.

    A custom RequestHelperFactory can return a different RequestHelper implementation (the DefaultRequestHelperFactoryreturns instaces of DefaultRequestHelper)
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:
    Fabrizio Giustina

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RequestHelper getRequestHelperInstance(javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext)
      returns a RequestHelper instance for a given request.

    • Method Detail

      • getRequestHelperInstance

        RequestHelper getRequestHelperInstance(javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext)
        returns a RequestHelper instance for a given request.
        Parameters:
        pageContext - PageContext passed by the tag
        Returns:
        RequestHelper instance
